title: Lo-Yu Chang
text: Hello, I am Lo-Yu Chang, a Biochemistry, Cellular and Molecular Biology (BCMB) PhD student and concurrent Biostatistics MHS student at the Johns Hopkins University.

title: About
text:
Fun
Outside of lab, I enjoy railfanning, attending my aquarium and plants, and astronomy.
Fun fact: JHU has a telescope that is open to public on certain Fridays, and you can get trained to use it as well!
